title: Charlotte's Web
short_plot_summary: A gentle spider named Charlotte befriends a young pig named Wilbur and weaves webs with words to save him from being slaughtered.
explanation: A pig, representing the main character, Wilbur
A spider, symbolizing the other main character, Charlotte
A spider web, illustrating Charlotte's ability to create webs with words to save Wilbur
A Ferris wheel, representing the fair where Wilbur is showcased
A medal, signifying the prize Wilbur receives at the fair, which ultimately saves his life
